attributes.title: Worst day of my life!!
attributes.review: I have god in my room he kept staring at me 👀 like he was gonna make the devil (trump) go away and never come back. So he said if I rated this 1 star ⭐️ trump will be a peace a trash and I was like he already is one and I was maybe he can be the dumpster 🤗. Most baddest add I have ever got and it even burned my eyes.

attributes.title: this app tried to kill my fish
attributes.review: i was minding my own business and thought i would download the app. i set my phone down and i look over and my phone just jumped in my fish tank!!! my fish died from the impact. i took my phone in and they said the problem was this app. i DEMAND a new fish😤

attributes.title: get this off my phone now!!
attributes.review: Not only did my phone crash from having the app but I was absurd by what I had seen opening this app you really should not have this on apple anymore very upsetting made me want to cry if I could give this 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: Untrustful
attributes.review: I really thought this was gonna be a good app but once I downloaded it my phone kept crashing. It started glitching and I thought it was just me so I powered my phone off. Now I can’t turn it back on. This app is horrible. Deserves less than 1 star but I can’t

attributes.title: scam
attributes.review: so as the app says trump 2020 but like he didn’t win so that’s a lie the president is lying that’s just not right and what is he going to do for us if he wins nothing because he did nothing for us this 4 years if anything he did things worse like not saving life’s all he had to do was listen a shut us down and now he is taking our rights for social media like wow what a president maybe instead of worrying about your self you should worry about a pandemic that will kill millions at the rate welp do i have to say more

attributes.title: 😹🍤😸🍊bussy

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!! 😖😡😡😭
attributes.review: All I wanted to do was support our current pres but this stupid app made it impossible. It may be so bad because it is associated with Donald trump. My suggestion is to elect a new president preferably smarter, maturer, a better leader, and one that is not sexist, racist, homophobic, etc. I predict we can “make America great again” without an orange as our president.

attributes.title: THIS APP DOES NOT WORK
attributes.review: As soon as I tried to open this app to see if Tr*mp actually had redeeming qualities it crashed and crashed and crashed again which really reflects on the character of this person I can't believe anyone would actually download this app and comfortably use it

attributes.title: ✨Crashes✨
attributes.review: I wanted to see the oranges agenda but as soon as I tried to open the app, it crashed. I had a good amount of hope for mr. president seeing as he had so much time to work on the app when he was hiding in his bunker but I don’t see why it would just crash like that. Very dissapointed.
